title: Technology-Enhanced Mathematics Learning Design: Context-Based Deep Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Learners are office/administrative professionals with beginner-level expertise in mathematics, aiming to enhance real-life problem-solving skills through digital device-enabled project execution

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze complex mathematical problems and design solutions using technological tools
Learners can complete projects that solve real-world workplace problems by applying mathematical principles in contextual situations
Learners can communicate and collaborate effectively in large-scale team project environments using digital collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
